production.responsibleIdentity: The Macallan Estate Distillery, Craigellachie, Moray, Scotland
production.productName: The Macallan 25 Years Old Sherry Oak
production.productionLocation: Easter Elchies House, Craigellachie AB38 9RX, Scotland
production.productionNotes: Distilled in 1999 from malted barley. Matured 25 years in hand-selected European oak sherry casks from Jerez, Spain. Bottled at 43% ABV in 2024. Master Distiller: Stuart MacPherson. Rich sherry influence with notes of dried fruits, chocolate, and oak complexity.

national-distribution.qualityInspection: All 2,400 bottles inspected. Seals intact, labels verified, QR codes functional. Temperature logs during transport: 14-16°C maintained. No damage detected.
national-distribution.transferNotes: Complete batch transfer. High-value spirits protocol applied. 24/7 security monitoring activated.
national-distribution.storageConditions: High-security bonded warehouse, climate-controlled at 16°C, 60% humidity. 24/7 CCTV surveillance, access restricted to authorized personnel only.
national-distribution.transportMethod: Secured truck with GPS tracking, tamper-proof seals, armed escort for high-value cargo
national-distribution.responsibleIdentity: Edrington UK - National Premium Spirits Distributor

import-1.storageConditions: Climate-controlled secure warehouse at 18°C, 65% humidity. Bonded facility preparing Asian export allocations.
import-1.transferNotes: First international transfer. 500 bottles allocated for Asian premium market distribution via Hong Kong hub.
import-1.transportMethod: Refrigerated truck with GPS tracking and tamper-evident seals
import-1.responsibleIdentity: La Maison du Whisky, 38 Rue de Sèvres, 75007 Paris, France
import-1.fromEntity: Edrington UK - National Premium Spirits Distributor

export.storageConditions: Climate-controlled air cargo container at 18°C. Real-time temperature monitoring throughout flight. Tamper-evident seals applied.
export.transferNotes: Air cargo export to Hong Kong for Greater China market distribution. Premium spirits handling protocol. ETA: 24 hours.
export.fromEntity: La Maison du Whisky, 38 Rue de Sèvres, 75007 Paris, France
export.transportMethod: Air cargo flight AF129, Paris CDG → Hong Kong HKG. Climate-controlled container, GPS tracking, ETA 24 hours

import-2.transferNotes: Final import from Hong Kong to Shanghai mainland. Bilingual CN/EN labels applied for PRC market compliance. All 150 bottles blockchain QR-verified.
import-2.transportMethod: Climate-controlled refrigerated truck from Hong Kong border to Shanghai Free Trade Zone
import-2.responsibleIdentity: Shanghai Premium Spirits Import Co., Ltd.
import-2.storageConditions: Shanghai Free Trade Zone bonded warehouse. Climate-controlled at 18°C, 65% humidity. Secured facility with 24/7 monitoring.

retail.provenanceVerified: Complete blockchain-verified provenance: Scotland (Macallan Distillery) → UK (Edrington) → France (La Maison du Whisky) → Hong Kong (Golden Dragon Spirits) → Shanghai (Premium Import). All 5 international transfers cryptographically signed and verified on-chain.
retail.fromEntity: Shanghai Premium Spirits Import Co., Ltd.
retail.transferNotes: White-glove delivery to Emperor's Cellar luxury retail location. Bottle #92 selected for premium collector market. Complete provenance available via QR blockchain scan.
retail.transportMethod: White-glove secured delivery with insurance. Climate-controlled transport, signature required.
retail.responsibleIdentity: Emperor's Cellar - Shanghai Whisky Palace, Nanjing Road West, Jing'an District
retail.storageConditions: Luxury climate-controlled cellar at 18°C, 65% humidity. VIP tasting room available for high-value purchases. 24/7 security.

consumer.usage: Private whisky collection in Shanghai penthouse. Will be displayed in climate-controlled display case.
consumer.tastingNotes: 深郁红棕色，极致雪莉橡木桌香。口感：丰富的干果（葡萄干、无花果）、黑巧克力、肉桂。余韵漫长，温暖而优雅。| Deep mahogany color, sublime sherry oak influence. Palate: Rich dried fruits (raisins, figs), dark chocolate, cinnamon. Long, warm, elegant finish.
consumer.fromEntity: Emperor's Cellar - Shanghai Whisky Palace, Nanjing Road West, Jing'an District
consumer.feedback: 令人惊叹！扫描QR码，我可以看到这瓶威士忌从1999年苏格兰蒸馆到上海的完整历程：苏格兰 → 英国 → 法国 → 香港 → 上海。每一步都在区块链上被加密验证。这就是真正的透明度，这就是为什么值每一分钱。 | Simply extraordinary! Scanning the QR code, I can see this whisky's complete journey from 1999 Scotland distillation to Shanghai: Scotland → UK → France → Hong Kong → Shanghai. Every step cryptographically verified on blockchain. This is true transparency, this is why it's worth every yuan. 25 years of Scottish craftsmanship, impossible to counterfeit.
consumer.responsibleIdentity: Wei Chen (陈伟) - Shanghai Premium Spirits Collector
consumer.finalDestination: Private collection, Lujiazui penthouse, Pudong, Shanghai
